com.extjs.gxt.ui.client.widget.selection
Interface SelectionModel<C extends Component>

Type Parameters:
C - the selection source type
All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractListSelectionModel, DataListSelectionModel, MultiTreeSelectionModel, RowSelectionModel, SingleTreeSelectionModel, TableSelectionModel, TreeSelectionModel
public interface SelectionModel<C extends Component>

Base interface for selection models. Defines the minimum methods required by a selection model.

Method Summary
 void bind(C component)
          Binds the selection model to the component.
 void deselectAll()
          Clears all selections.
 void refresh()
          Refreshes the current selections.
 void selectAll()
          Selects all items.
